metadata.title: CVE-2017-16664 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Code injection exists in Kernel/System/Spelling.pm in Open Ticket RequestSystem (OTRS) 5 before 5.0.24, 4 before 4.0.26, and 3.3 before 3.3.20. Inthe agent interface, an authenticated remote attacker can execute shellcommands as the webserver user via URL manipulation.

criterions.comment: otrs2 package in esm-apps/xenial is affected and needs fixing.
